string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I need you to report to someone in the field. I have marked his location on your PDA.
Good luck stalker.
Sniper
Major Kuznetsov has ordered you to eliminate a target from a distance.
I have a high-value target that has been located. He is not easy to get to so I need someone who is an extremely accurate long-range precision shooter.
Excellent marksmanship. Well done.
Assault Enemy Camp
Lead your squad in the assault on an enemy encampment.
We’re preparing an assault on an enemy camp. The commander has issued everyone new weapons. I need you to be on point for the inital attack.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Defend Military Base
Defend the Military base against an enemy assault.
Enemy forces have been spotted in the area. The commander suspects they are plotting an assault on our base. Take your squad out and make contact. Neutralize the threat.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
One of our allies needs our help. Report to him and see what assistance you can give.
Good luck stalker.
Battle Plans
Lieutenant Kirilov has learned the location of enemy battle plans and needs them captured.
An informant has revealed the location of the enemy’s battle plans. I need you to infiltrate the area and retrieve the plans.
Well done! You haved saved many lives with this.
Patrol Local Area
Patrol the area around Agoroprom.
It’s your turn for sentry duty. Patrol the local area and keep an eye out for any unauthorized personnel.
Good work. The commander will be pleased.
Bribe Kuznetsov To Join the Military
Major Kuznetsov will accept a 8,000 RU payment to let you join the Military

You want to enlist? Well, you’ll never pass the physical requirements will all the radiation you’ve absorbed in the Zone. Tell you what though, if you’re willing to slip me 8,000 RU I might be persuaded to look the other way.
Very well. Welcome to the Military, soldier.
Stop Unauthorized Incursions
You have been assigned to lead an assault to clear out any unauthorized individuals.

HQ is concerned about the rising number of incursions into the Zone. I want you to take a squad and sweep the local area for unauthorized personnel. Keep alert for any friendlies, but anyone else you see you are cleared to shoot on sight.
Great job. Keep it up you’ll be in line for a commendation.
Capture Territory for Kuznetsov
You have been ordered to capture territory within the Zone.
Our unit has been tasked with pushing further into the Zone. The commander is looking for volunteers to capture territory for us. Can I inform him of your cooperation?
The task is done? Good job. I’ll inform the commander right away of your success.
Capture Enemy Combatant
You have been assigned a hostile target to capture or kill.
HQ has a list of of most wanted individuals in the Zone. If you can get to any of them, there will be a bonus in your next paycheck. Are you up for the job?
Outstanding work! The commander will be pleased.
Find %s for Kirilov
%s are required by Kirilov to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, can I ask you a favour? If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! You brought exactly what I’ve asked. Thanks.
Find %s for Kirilov
%s are required by Kirilov to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Find %s for Kirilov
%s are required by Kirilov to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Find %s for the military
You have been assigned to find and bring a set of medical supplies for the military.
I can handle small wounds for now, but few bandages and medkits won’t keep everyone alive forever. I need a good set of medical supplies, can you bring them to me?
I can handle small wounds for now, but few bandages and medkits won’t keep everyone alive forever. I need a good set of medical supplies, can you bring them to me?
Great, back to work.
